name: Racer (itch) (james) (james)
description:
A racing game made in 240x135 resolution with the ltro-1 palette

Finish 1st to go to the next race. 

To drift, press the drift key while turning.  Drifting will allow you to make tighter corners.

The turbo meter will decrease while the turbo is running, collect coins to replenish the meter

Controls:
x - accelerate
z - drift
up - turbo
left/right - steer
down - brake

or use the ltro-1 keys:
space - accelerate
left alt - drift
up - turbo
left/right - steer
down - brake
